page.title: 14Religion in N.W. Guildford
page.content: Within the area there is a variety of{Christian}churches, including several Anglican, Roman Catholic, Methodist and United Reformed. There is also an Evangelical Free Church. The whole area is dominated by the Cathedral of the Holy Spirit on Stag Hill. We visited{St. Peter's Church.}This is situated in the middle of the Bellfields housing estate and is a united Church of England and United Reformed Church. The vicar has been there for 9 years and told us that the church was built in 1968. There are various weekday activities, including Housegroups and a Tuesday fellowship. 19O people attend the 1O.OO a.m. Sunday service, one of the three services during the day. A communion service is also held on Wednesdays. The "New English Bible" is used.
